text: Jean-Pierre Chevènement (; born 9 March 1939List of Senators re-elected in 2008 (PDF file), Senate website .) is a French politician. He was a minister in the 1980s and 1990s. He is best known for his candidacy in the 2002 French presidential election. He was mayor of Belfort. He was elected to the Senate for the Territoire de Belfort in 2008. He is a co-founder of the PS and founder of the Republican and Citizen Movement (MRC). ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:Territoire de Belfort
title: Jean-Pierre Chevènement
